TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BestWorkerMode extends Azure.Communication.JobRouter.DistributionMode

Docs.summary: Jobs are distributed to the worker with the strongest abilities available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of BestWorkerModePolicy with default scoring rule. Default scoring formula that uses the number of job labels that the worker labels match, as well as the number of label selectors the worker labels match and/or exceed using a logistic function (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logistic_function).

MemberSignature.Value: public BestWorkerMode (Azure.Communication.JobRouter.RouterRule scoringRule, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Azure.Communication.JobRouter.ScoringRuleParameterSelector> scoringParameterSelectors = default, bool allowScoringBatchOfWorkers = false, int? batchSize = default, bool descendingOrder = true);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Azure.Communication.JobRouter.RouterRule scoringRule, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<valuetype Azure.Communication.JobRouter.ScoringRuleParameterSelector> scoringParameterSelectors, bool allowScoringBatchOfWorkers, valuetype System.Nullable`1<int32> batchSize, bool descendingOrder) cil managed

Public Sub New (scoringRule As RouterRule, Optional scoringParameterSelectors As IList(Of ScoringRuleParameterSelector) = Nothing, Optional allowScoringBatchOfWorkers As Boolean = false, Optional batchSize As Nullable(Of Integer) = Nothing, Optional descendingOrder As Boolean = true)

Docs.param: Defines a scoring rule to use, when calculating a score to determine the best worker.
(Optional) List of that will be sent as part of the payload to scoring rule.
(Optional) If true, will try to obtain scores for a batch of workers. By default, set to false.
(Optional) Set batch size when 'allowScoringBatchOfWorkers' is set to true to control batch size of workers. Defaults to 20 if not set.
(Optional) If false, will sort scores by ascending order. By default, set to true.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of BestWorkerModePolicy with user-specified scoring rule.
